meanings.definition: A person or entity that divides or distributes something into parts or shares.
meanings.sent1: The portioners at the party made sure everyone got an equal amount of cake.
meanings.sent2: The school cafeteria hired new portioners to help serve lunch to the students.
meanings.sent3: The portioners at the picnic were so precise, they even divided the chips evenly.
meanings.sent4: The portioners of wisdom shared their knowledge with the younger generation.
meanings.sent5: The portioners in the game evenly distributed the points among all players.

meanings.definition: A device or tool used for measuring or dividing portions.
meanings.sent1: The chef used a digital portioners to measure the ingredients for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The bakery invested in new portioners to ensure consistent portion sizes for their pastries.
meanings.sent3: The portioners in the kitchen drawer always came in handy during baking.
meanings.sent4: The portioners in the cafeteria helped streamline the serving process.
meanings.sent5: The portioners in the restaurant kitchen were essential for accurate food preparation.
